subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Cespedes had three doubles, tying a franchise record, and drove in four runs as the Mets crushed the Marlins and moved past the Nationals atop the N.L. East.
snippet: Cespedes had three doubles, tying a franchise record, and drove in four runs as the Mets crushed the Marlins and moved past the Nationals atop the N.L. East.
